scriptsDescriptions.EXPLANATION: dummy object only used to comment built scripts(will be ignored by npm)
scriptsDescriptions.sls: alias for serverless command(further command will be applied. E.g: npm run sls deploy -- --stage local ...)
scriptsDescriptions.serverless: alias for serverless command(further command will be applied. E.g: npm run serverless deploy -- --stage local ...)
scriptsDescriptions.offline: alias for sls offline command with debugger(script used to start serverless offline with docker-compatible vscode debugger, referencing local node_modules bin)
scriptsDescriptions.aws:ddb: alias for local container dynamodb aws-cli command(requires a double dash '--' to isolate npm script options from command(aws-cli) options. E.g: npm run aws:ddb describe-table -- --table-name ...)
